start.text: We will emerge a stronger soul from this.
Eye for an eye, ship for a ship.
Treat others as you would treat them.

start_boss.text: The gods are watching, let's give em'a good show!

retreat.text: The gods aren't in our favor today.

out_of_missiles.text: Oh that's unfortunate, racks are dry!

engaged.text: I live to serve my oath!

need_help.text: Things are turning ugly, send help.

pursuing.text: Fate has unfortunately caught up you them.

hull_90.text: Seems that we've agitated them, fire back!

hull_50.text: Oh, blessed be, that's a big hole.
Oh great heavens! Ship's roughed up.

hull_30.text: Oh heavens! there goes my navigator.
Heavy casualties sustained, the corpsmen are dead!
Ship's buckling, but my men are not. Please send help!

death.text: All remaining crew get the wounded into the skiffs, we're done!
May the souls guide the fallen

victory.text: The gods look at us with glee.
Battle's over, secure the wounded, assess battle damage.
